mentors.name: Joel Noble
mentors.description: Joel Noble is a founder, and has been the lead mentor and head coach since the team started in 2004. He plays a crucial role in keeping Angelbotics operational, and is an amazing person.

mentors.name: Chad B
mentors.description: Chad mentors our Programming and Electrical sub-teams. He helps diagnose issues with the electrical, and helps brainstorm about the concept behind the code.
